general.gigTitle: build shopify store or shopify website development or shopify website design

sellerCard.description: I have 9 years practical experience in Shopify and WordPress Website Development . I have created  more than 1000+ unique websites  and worked over 3000  projects .I  Hope you'll enjoy  working with me

description.content:
Hi There,

If you are looking for Shopify Expert  for your shopify website development you are in right place.

 .

If you need any kind of assistance in following area you can order my gig:



  • Creating Shopify website from scratch 
  • Complete Shopify website Design or Development
  • PSD to Shopify Theme Development 
  • Dropshipping store,
  • Any custom shopify website design,
  • Custom Shopify theme development,
  • Mega menu design 
  • Collection page filter or sidebar function development
  • Cart Drawer add or ajax cart functionality
  • Custom Product page Design
  • Fix any HTML or CSS error on Shopify
  • Header or footer design
  • product upload and image re sizing
  • Single page design or modification on shopify site
  • Contact form page for shopify store


Subscription Product page design and recurring apps integration 


 Shopify apps integration 


Drop-shipping product research from Ali express 


update content and much more...


You Should provide shopify admin access .


Note :Please message me before ordering to avoid any misunderstandings.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you Develop Custom Theme ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes I can develop Custom Theme according to your requirements .  I can add functionality and theme customization option on your theme .

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you convert PSD to shopify Theme ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes i can convert Photoshop file to Shopify Theme , you can Provide me Design i can develop Shopify Website according to your design .

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you Provide logo for the website ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes if you need logo , i can create logo for you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What will happen if I am not satisfied ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
If you are not satisfied , we will go for revision, I will do any modification or changes on my work , 
I will stay till the end . I will totally complete your project and make you happy . 
As I believe in customer satisfaction is the key of my success .

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you create shopify account for me ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes I can create Development store for you , there you will get unlimited trial period , where you can stay until you launch your site , at the time of complete of development you can pick any package and start selling . I can create a perfect Shopify store for you .

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you provide guideline How to maintain site after development ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes , we will give you video instruction guide if need , you can easily update everything when you need .

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you provide after sell support ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes I will provide 10 days after sell support , and if any issues on my work I will give support anytime .

reviews.comment: This was a great experience. Even though I was a little slow getting content to him, Codekanon was patient and quickly completed all of the revisions that I wanted. The transfer of ownership over Zoom was super helpful! Thank You!

The designer has done an outstanding job in ensuring the website is fast and responsive. The seamless performance across devices, from desktops to mobile phones, is a testament to their technical expertise and understanding of user experience. Every interaction feels smooth and effortless, which is no small feat.
Absolutely brilliant service from start to finish. My new website is perfect and I would recommend to everyone!

Great to work with! Highly recommend Richard and his team

.
He is Very detail-oriented and understands the requirements very well. It was a pleasure.

reviews_snippet.comment: Absolutely incredible experience. I genuinely cannot recommend these guys highly enough and there is a reason why they're a top rated seller on Fiverr. This is the second time I've worked with them and they have once again delivered exactly what I wanted. The quality of work, speed, coding and everything is top notch. If you have a request and they are not sure if it's possible in the moment, they never say no and always find a way. And most importantly, they are incredibly patient and don't make you feel rushed. All in all, I'm delighted with my experience and they deserve all the credit.
Amazing work! Delivered exactly what we asked for in a great time frame. Will be using him for all future work.

Working with Codekanon was a pleasure! The professionalism and attention to detail were outstanding, making the website development top-notch. They truly went above and beyond, creating an exceptional experience. 🙌

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Exceptional Shopify Store Setup by Richard Gomez

I recently had the pleasure of working with Richard Gomez to set up my Shopify store, and I couldn't be more thrilled with the outcome. Here’s an in-depth review covering various aspects of his work
Professionalism of Work
From the initial consultation to the final touches, Richard exhibited high professionalism. He communicated clearly and promptly, ensuring I was always in the loop regarding the project's progress. His approach was methodical and organized, which made the entire process smooth and stress-free.
Attention to Details
One of the standout qualities of Richard is his impeccable attention to detail. He meticulously ensured that every aspect of the store, from the layout and design to the product descriptions and images, was perfect. He didn’t overlook a single element, which significantly enhanced the overall user experience on the site.
Deep Understanding
Richard demonstrated a deep understanding of Shopify's platform and e-commerce best practices. He provided insightful recommendations that I hadn’t considered, which helped optimize the store’s performance. His expertise was evident in the seamless navigation and the intuitive design of the storefront.
Went Above and Beyond
What truly sets Richard apart is his willingness to go above and beyond to ensure client satisfaction. He not only met but exceeded my expectations by adding extra features and functionalities that were not initially part of the project scope. His dedication to delivering a top-notch product was evident in every step of the process.
Final Result
The final result is a beautifully designed, user-friendly Shopify store that perfectly aligns with my brand’s vision. The collections are easily accessible through a clear and intuitive menu, and the aesthetic appeal of the store is outstanding. Thanks to Richard, my store is now equipped to provide an excellent shopping experience for my customers.

Overall, I highly recommend Richard Gomez for any Shopify-related projects. His professionalism, attention to detail, deep understanding of the platform, and commitment to going the extra mile make him an exceptional choice for anyone looking to set up or enhance their e-commerce store.

Thank you, Richard, and Kudos for your outstanding work!
Parfait, développeur compréhensif et à l'écoute. Ne rechigne pas lorsqu'il est nécessaire de faire des modifications. Aux petit soins pour ses clients. Merci Codekanon pour tout !
